item.description:
This concert is one of a series put on during Newburyport's Yankee Homecoming. These concerts are FREE, well-attended, and take place in Waterfront Park - behind The Firehouse Center For The Arts. Music is scheduled to begin at 7:30pm. Please bring a chair or blanket and anything you may wish to snack on.... It's a great night out!

www.yankeehomcoming.com

 

* WE WILL MEETUP: at the bench (by the shadey tree) in front of The Firehouse Center For The Arts. I will have a meetup pin /and sign. It's advised to be there early for a good spot. Parking can be tight, so please make sure to plan for that. I will add and send out my contact 3 the day before.   *This is a shared event with other meetup groups.

 

JAMES MONTGOMERY- www.jamesmontgomery.com
item.how_to_find_us: meetup at the bench (by shadey tree) outside The Firehouse -please read description for more info

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Concert Series @ Waterfront Park - JAMES MONTGOMERY
